description:
A total of 5 pieces of BGM will be added.
Enjoy listening to new BGM.

■Content
 BGM "CYCLONIZED TYPHOON -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "Cherry Blossoms -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "Petals in the Wind -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "HALF LINE -TRINITY MIX-"
 BGM "INTERWINDS"

■How to use
You can set BGM from camp by selecting "Gallery" - "Music", or by selecting a track from the pre-battle loading screen.
name: BGM Pack 2
